channel.title: Comments on: Lessons Learned from Failing the MCTS 70-432
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Linda
item.dc:creator: Linda
item.content:encoded:
I failed first time in August 2011.
Tried again last month and PASSED!!
Lesson learned from both tries –
Study all topics eqaully,
Study book 2 times
Do some good brain dumps…..

item.title: By: Vince
item.dc:creator: Vince
item.description: I'm a SQL server dba with 4 years of experience. I took the exam back in November and failed (662 :( ).. I had a very hard time with questions relating to SQL profiler, data warehouse, and database mirroring. I don't normally use those bits of SQL server in my day to day job. I aced the sections pertaining to backup/restores, replication, and instance installation. I've been trying to study up on those bits of the test I had a big problem with. Taking the exam later today. Feeling much more confident than the first time around. You'll do great next time!
item.content:encoded: I’m a SQL server dba with 4 years of experience. I took the exam back in November and failed (662 üôÅ ).. I had a very hard time with questions relating to SQL profiler, data warehouse, and database mirroring. I don’t normally use those bits of SQL server in my day to day job. I aced the sections pertaining to backup/restores, replication, and instance installation. I’ve been trying to study up on those bits of the test I had a big problem with. Taking the exam later today. Feeling much more confident than the first time around. You’ll do great next time!

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
Don’t let it intimidate you! Just be very prepared.

I signed up through the Prometric website, and took the exam at a New Horizons Learning Center.

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.content:encoded:
I’ve got a little less than three years of sql experience, and trying to take one of the tests still intimidates me.

Where did you take your practice exams at?

item.title: By: Matt Velic
item.dc:creator: Matt Velic
item.description: Everything is a learning experience. You now know where you need to study additionally and you'll pass it come next time. And you've also got a sweet gig at K-C to help you get that experience too.
item.content:encoded: Everything is a learning experience. You now know where you need to study additionally and you’ll pass it come next time. And you’ve also got a sweet gig at K-C to help you get that experience too.

item.title: By: Don Kolenda
item.dc:creator: Don Kolenda
item.description: Don't worry, Jes. I didn't pass my first time, either. Hang in there; you'll get it! I believe in you!
item.content:encoded: Don’t worry, Jes. I didn’t pass my first time, either. Hang in there; you’ll get it! I believe in you!

item.title: By: Janice Lee
item.dc:creator: Janice Lee
item.description: You passed the BIGGER test on this one, Jes.<br /> *Really* impressed with how you handled this.
item.content:encoded:
You passed the BIGGER test on this one, Jes.
*Really* impressed with how you handled this.

item.title: By: dmmaxwell
item.dc:creator: dmmaxwell
item.content:encoded:
Glad to see I’m not the only one that fails one of these every now and then. Don’t sweat it, and the next time, I’m confident you’ll pass.

Good Luck on Round Two! üôÇ

item.title: By: Jack Corbett
item.dc:creator: Jack Corbett
item.description: Wow. I'm surprised, I thought you'd ace it. Keep your head up, SQL Server is a HUGE product so I'm sure you'll get it next time.
item.content:encoded: Wow. I’m surprised, I thought you’d ace it. Keep your head up, SQL Server is a HUGE product so I’m sure you’ll get it next time.

item.title: By: Kendra Little
item.dc:creator: Kendra Little
item.content:encoded:
It takes a lot of courage and character to tell people that you’re taking an exam, as well as how you did. I admire your openness and honesty!

I also know from your tweets and blog posts that you know a lot about SQL Server and that you love to learn. In my book, you’re succeeding by a ton of measures. I am really looking forward to seeing you present in the future, too.
